name: Full Day Snorkel the Great Barrier Reef
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure to the Great Barrier Reef aboard our premium purpose-built vessel. Perfect for families, couples, and solo travelers, this full-day tour offers a unique opportunity to snorkel in the vibrant waters of Bait Reef. Enjoy the scenic journey through the Whitsundays, with a stop at Hamilton Island, before reaching the reef. Experience the underwater world with the guidance of our experienced snorkel guides, ensuring a safe and memorable exploration of this natural wonder.
includes:
Transfer via Hamilton Island
3.5 hours on location at Bait Reef
Snorkeling at two different locations
Healthy buffet style lunch, morning and afternoon tea
High quality snorkeling equipment including wetsuits/stinger suits and flotation jackets
Guided snorkeling tours and in-water support from experienced instructors
highlights:
Snorkel the vibrant coral and marine life at Bait Reef
Premium purpose-built vessel with easy water access
Experienced and friendly team
Scenic route through the Whitsundays
Opportunity to see diverse marine life including parrotfish, angelfish, and possibly turtles or reef sharks
Luxurious vessel with air-conditioned comfort and lounge style seating
important_information: ['This tour is recommended for children 5 years and over.', 'Children under 5 years are welcome, however there are limitations with regards to their participation.', 'You must be confident in the water and be able to swim to participate.']
whats_extra: ['Prices include any applicable fees for Environmental Management (EMC) and National Parks.', 'Pricing subject to change.']
cancellation_policy: Cancel 48 hours prior to the cruise timing - no fee. Cancel between 24 & 48 hours prior to the cruise timing - 50% fee. Cancel within 24 hours prior to the cruise timing - 100% fee. In the event that we cancel due to weather conditions the guest will be offered a full refund or an alternative day.

name: Full Day Dive the Great Barrier Reef from Shute Harbour
description: Embark on a thrilling full-day diving adventure to the secluded Bait Reef, perfect for intermediate to advanced divers. Departing from Shute Harbour, Airlie Beach, this tour offers a unique opportunity to explore the vibrant marine life of the Great Barrier Reef. With experienced guides leading the way, you'll discover a world teeming with sharks, rays, turtles, and colorful fish. Ideal for diving enthusiasts seeking an intimate and informative experience in one of the world's most breathtaking underwater landscapes.
departure_times: Departs Shute Harbour, transfers via Hamilton Island
includes:
Two dives at the reef
All gear hire
Guided by experienced Dive Masters or Instructors
Healthy buffet style lunch
Morning and afternoon tea
High quality equipment including wetsuit/stinger suits
Informative commentary during 2-hour cruise to location each way
highlights:
Explore Bait Reef, an intermediate to advanced dive site
Small group diving experience
Discover a variety of marine life including sharks, rays, and turtles
Visit at least 2 different dive locations
Cruise on a premium custom-designed dive/snorkel vessel
Air-conditioned luxury and lounge-style seating onboard
Comfortable entry and exit from the water with a full beam swim platform
important_information: ['Children must be 12 years and older to participate in diving.', 'Divers aged 12 to 14 years old must dive with a certified parent or guardian.', 'You must complete a diving medical questionnaire before being able to dive with us.', 'All certified divers must produce their certification card or log book at the time of booking.']
whats_extra: ['Pricing increases apply from 1st April 2025.', 'Pricing subject to change.']
